products.title: Harrow Mimosa Gold Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
Imagine how warm your home would feel with these harrow mimosa gold roman blinds at your windows. We can just imagine the sunlight shining off them on a lazy sunday morning. Bliss!

Traditionally yellow looks great in a kitchen and this blind is no exception. But if you wanted

products.title: Choices Harrow Mimosa Gold Roller Blind
products.metadescription:
Its always sunny...Well, wherever you hang this choices harrow mimosa gold roller blind. This energetic shade is somewhere in that sweet spot between over the top gold and garish yellow. As goldilocks would say, just right!
